snippet.title: Tomb Stalkers Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The lost city of EL DORADO has been found. You've been sent by the British Museum with the mission to recover the lost treasures that have been there for centuries... But no one knew the city was habited. The chance to return with riches and fame are in your hands.

Will you face the challenge?

Gameplay Description:

Tomb Stalkers is a Action Arcade Puzzle game like few with fast paced game mechanics. Walk around the tombs to open them and reveal their content, you require to get a key and a relic to be able to unlock the exit to the next level. But beware, the sorceress (living, undead and even gods) minions are upon you with their unique and annoying abilities. Even her will join to the chase if is provoked enough! Each scenario contains secrets and traps to be aware of in your search of riches and fame.

Demo Features:
- 6 levels from 3 of the 4 scenarios, including a boss battle
- 2 Player Co-op game local and via Steam Remote Play
- Arcade Mode only
- 4 Levels of Difficulty
- Compatible with any kind of gamepad
- Compatible with Steam Deck
- Available for PC, OSX and Linux

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2536990/Tomb_Stalkers/
